title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenues in million euros, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Revenues in million euros has increased over the Year.

Revenues in million euros is roughly constant from 2005 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2013, roughly increasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2017, and lastly gradually increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Revenues in million euros about 14266.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Revenues in million euros about 5700.0 was recorded at Year 2006
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenues in million euros, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2005 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
